name: TypeRider (AdamoGrando)
description:
Racing game for two players. Delivering christmas gifts to homes. Cooperation of a driver and typer. 

Controls:
Driver - Arrows (Keyboard) / RT, LT, LeftAnalog (Controller)

Typer - Keyboard

Used assets: 
- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/buto...

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/epic-toon-fx-57772

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/low-poly-asset-bundle-1962...

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/roadways/low-poly-road-pac...

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/prometeo-car-controller-2094...

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/christmas-music-240...

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256
